description.full: This sample add a command menu with a dropdown list of commands for your bot. Users can select a command from the list, which will insert the command title into the compose box. Then, they can select Send to execute the command.

commands.title: Search Flights
commands.description: Search flights from Seattle to Phoenix May 2-5 departing after 3pm
commands.prompt: Search flights from Seattle to Phoenix May 2-5 departing after 3pm. Please show me the best options.

commands.title: Search Hotels
commands.prompt: I need to find hotels in Portland for tonight. Please show me available options with good ratings.

commands.title: Best Time to Fly
commands.description: Best time to fly to London for a 5 day trip is summer
commands.prompt: What is the best time to fly to London for a 5 day trip? I'm looking for good weather and reasonable prices.
